metadata.name: Old Man Winter
metadata.description:
Father winter is a hand sculpture i made in real life on a glass bottle.
The sculpture has been 3D scanned and imported into blender where a whole new bottle was made, the .GLB file was later imported to BabylonJS for some finishing touches.
This artwork is a tribute to Bioshock and it is my version of the "Old Man Winter" plasmid.
